description: Roof extension to main rear roof slope; creation of second floor roof terrace; and installation of two rooflights to front roof slope
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: 2720-10 (Existing Location Plan, Site Plan, Floor Plans & Sections), 2720-11 (Existing Elevations), 2720-100 Rev C (Proposed Floor Plans & Sections) and 2720-110 Rev C (Proposed Elevations).

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | The hereby approved two (2) rooflights to the front roof slope shall not protrude more than 150mm when measured perpendicularly from the plane of the roof slope.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | The timber trellis/fencing to the side-facing aspects of the hereby approved roof terrace shall be implemented prior to the first use of the roof terrace and shall be permanently retained thereafter.
Reason: To safeguard the amenities of neighbouring sites in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and SPD4.
